mcq.statement: Choose the correct sentence: write a paragraph on 'Good Manner' in your notebook

options.a: write a paragraph on 'Good Manners' in your notebook
options.b: write a paragraph on 'Good Manners; in your copy
options.c: write a paragraph on 'Good Manners' in your diary
options.d: write a paragraph on 'Good Manners' in your noting book
